Heading: Publication date
Note: Nominal date of publication (of the content item or supporting resource)

Heading: Broadcast date
Note: Date when a TV or radio program was / will be broadcast

Heading: From date
Note: Date from which a content item or supporting resource may be referenced or used. The content is embargoed until this date

Heading: Until date
Note: Date until which a content item or supporting resource may be referenced or used

Heading: Last updated
Note: Date when a resource was last changed or updated

Heading: From… until date
Note: Combines From date and Until date to define a period (both dates are inclusive). Use with for example dateformat 06

Heading: Available from
Note: Date from which a supporting resource is available for download. Note that this date also implies that it can be immediately displayed to the intended audience, unless a From date (code 14) is also supplied and is later than the Available from date

Heading: Available until
Note: Date until which a supporting resource is available for download. Note that this date does not imply it must be removed from display to the intended audience on this date – for this, use Until date (code 15)

Heading: Associated start date
Note: Start date referenced by the supporting resource, for example, the ‘earliest exam date’ for an official recommendation

Heading: Associated end date
Note: End date referenced by the supporting resource, for example, the ‘latest exam date’ for an official recommendation
